statements: SELECT property_id, property_name, maintenance_expense FROM property_maintenance;
SELECT property_name, last_maintenance_date FROM property_maintenance WHERE property_id = 1;
SELECT property_name, maintenance_expense FROM property_maintenance WHERE last_maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM property_maintenance ORDER BY maintenance_expense DESC;
SELECT property_id, property_name, last_maintenance_date FROM property_maintenance WHERE maintenance_schedule LIKE '%monthly%';
SELECT * FROM property_maintenance WHERE property_id = 1;
SELECT property_name, maintenance_expense FROM property_maintenance WHERE last_maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT property_id, property_name, maintenance_schedule FROM property_maintenance ORDER BY property_name DESC;
SELECT AVG(maintenance_expense) AS avg_expense, MAX(maintenance_expense) AS max_expense FROM property_maintenance;
SELECT property_id, property_name, maintenance_expense FROM property_maintenance WHERE maintenance_expense < 500.00 ORDER BY maintenance_expense ASC;
SELECT * FROM PropertyMaintenanceSchedule
SELECT property_id, maintenance_date FROM PropertyMaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_id = 1
SELECT expense_amount, expense_date FROM MaintenanceExpenses WHERE maintenance_id = 1
SELECT maintenance_details FROM PropertyMaintenanceSchedule WHERE property_id = 10
SELECT expense_id, expense_amount, expense_date FROM MaintenanceExpenses WHERE expense_amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM PropertyMaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT property_id, maintenance_details FROM PropertyMaintenanceSchedule WHERE property_id = 1001 ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT property_id, COUNT(maintenance_id) AS maintenance_count FROM PropertyMaintenanceSchedule GROUP BY property_id HAVING maintenance_count > 3;

SELECT COUNT(property_id) AS total_properties, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM PropertyMaintenanceSchedule JOIN MaintenanceExpenses ON PropertyMaintenanceSchedule.maintenance_id = MaintenanceExpenses.maintenance_id WHERE expense_date = '2022-06-30';

SELECT property_id, AVG(expense_amount) AS avg_expense FROM PropertyMaintenanceSchedule JOIN MaintenanceExpenses ON PropertyMaintenanceSchedule.maintenance_id = MaintenanceExpenses.maintenance_id GROUP BY property_id ORDER BY avg_expense DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM property_maintenance_schedule;
SELECT property_id, maintenance_date, cost FROM property_maintenance_schedule ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT property_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM property_maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT property_id, maintenance_type, cost FROM property_maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Plumbing';
SELECT property_id, maintenance_date, cost FROM property_maintenance_schedule WHERE property_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM property_maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Plumbing' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT property_id, expense_type, amount FROM expenses WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT property_id, address, last_maintenance, next_maintenance FROM property_details WHERE address LIKE '123%' AND last_maintenance < '2022-01-01';
SELECT property_id, maintenance_type, cost FROM property_maintenance_schedule WHERE cost BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT expense_id, property_id, expense_type, expense_date FROM expenses WHERE expense_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM PropertyOwners;
SELECT owner_name, property_address FROM PropertyOwners WHERE owner_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT task_id, description, frequency FROM MaintenanceTasks ORDER BY frequency DESC;
SELECT log_id, property_id, completion_date FROM MaintenanceLog WHERE completion_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY completion_date ASC;
SELECT budget_id, estimated_expense, budget_month FROM BudgetPlanning WHERE estimated_expense > 5000;
SELECT owner_name, property_address FROM PropertyOwners;
SELECT task_id, description, frequency FROM MaintenanceTasks WHERE cost > 1000;
SELECT log_id, task_id, property_id, completion_date FROM MaintenanceLog ORDER BY completion_date DESC;
SELECT budget_id, actual_expense, budget_month FROM BudgetPlanning WHERE estimated_expense < actual_expense;
SELECT * FROM PropertyOwners JOIN MaintenanceLog ON PropertyOwners.id = MaintenanceLog.property_id;
SELECT * FROM properties;
SELECT property_name, address FROM properties ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE cost > 500 ORDER BY estimated_duration ASC;
SELECT task_name, task_description, cost FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE property_id = 3;
SELECT id, completion_date, comments FROM maintenance_history WHERE task_id = 7 ORDER BY completion_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM properties WHERE property_name = 'ABC Apartments';
SELECT property_name, address FROM properties ORDER BY address DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE cost > 500 AND estimated_duration < 10;
SELECT maintenance_tasks.task_name, expenses.amount FROM maintenance_tasks JOIN expenses ON maintenance_tasks.property_id = expenses.property_id WHERE expenses.amount > 1000;
SELECT maintenance_history.completion_date, expenses.amount FROM maintenance_history JOIN expenses ON maintenance_history.id = expenses.id WHERE expenses.amount < 500;
